topic.title: Assessment Section Proc Note - conformance rules

section.p: The Assessment section (also called impression or diagnoses) represents the clinician's conclusions and working assumptions that will guide treatment of the patient. The assessment formulates a specific plan or set of recommendations. The assessment may be a list of specific disease entities or a narrative block.
